name: cagents-marketplace
description: cAgents plugin marketplace - Universal multi-domain agent system with aggressive task decomposition and controller-centric architecture.

plugins.name: cagents
plugins.description: Universal multi-domain agent system with 231 specialized agents across 5 super-domains. V7.5 Task Inventory Edition with CSV-based tracking for large-scale workflows (60-80% context savings). Controller-centric question-based delegation architecture with parallel execution up to 50x speedup. Enhanced Claude Code hooks for safety and workflow tracking.
